original_text: And if they will learn any thing, let them ask their husbands at home: for it is a shame for women to speak in the church.
korean_text: 만일 무엇을 배우려거든 집에서 자기 남편에게 물을지니 여자가 교회에서 말하는 것은 부끄러운 것이라

sentences.original_text: And if they will learn any thing
let them ask their husbands at home:
for it is a shame for women
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 여자들이 말하는 것은 부끄러운 일이기 때문이다
